code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{fetchWeatherWithCache}from"../utils/weatherCache";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";async function get5DayForecast(lat,lon){return fetchWeatherWithCache("forecast_".concat(lat,"_").concat(lon),async()=>{const res=await fetch("https://api.open-meteo.com/v1/forecast?latitude=".concat(lat,"&longitude=").concat(lon,"&daily=temperature_2m_max,temperature_2m_min,weathercode&timezone=auto"));const data=await res.json();return data.daily;});}export default function FiveDayForecast(_ref){let{lat,lon}=_ref;const[forecast,setForecast]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{if(lat&&lon){get5DayForecast(lat,lon).then(setForecast);}},[lat,lon]);if(!forecast)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading 5-day forecast..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"forecast-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"5-Day Forecast"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"forecast-list",children:forecast.time.slice(0,5).map((date,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"forecast-day",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["\uD83C\uDF21\uFE0F ",forecast.temperature_2m_min[idx],"\xB0C - ",forecast.temperature_2m_max[idx],"\xB0C"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Code: ",forecast.weathercode[idx]]})]},date))})]});}
